docs.text: Welcome to Choco Choco is a high-level programming language, primarily intended for general use. It is designed to be a simple and convenient programming language for developers, borrowing syntax elements from Ruby, Go, and Rust! fn greet(name) { return "Hello, #{name}!"; } let greeting = greet("World"); puts greeting; Why Choose Choco? Easy to use : Simple, beautiful syntax that doesn't sacrifice readability or functionality Expressive : Write what you mean in a natural, readable way. Duck-based : If it looks like a duck and walks like a duck, then it must be a duck. Cross-Platform : Runs anywhere C/C++ runs. Getting Started [Install Choco] (getting-started/installation.md) - Set up your enviroment.
docs.title: Home
